name: Curse of the Pinball Wizard
description:
Build up your own custom Mana Generating Pinball-like Machine!

Generate Enough Mana to Out-Live the Curse that strikes with more intensity every 8 rounds!

Multiple Different and Viable Builds To Try!

4 Unique Stages To Challenge Yourself On!

Dev High-score:

Font Credit - 'Alagard' and 'Romulus':

https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-fonts-by-pix3m

Here's a devlog for the game over on my YouTube channel!
